title: Schema Acquisition and Cognitive Load Management Education Through Mathematical Translation Task Design

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to interpret basic mathematical symbols and experience in simple sentence translation
context.additional_context: Provision of collaborative and staged task environments utilizing digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can construct an accurate translation schema for mathematical terminology with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can reduce cognitive load by over 30% when translating complex mathematical problems by applying scaffolding strategies.
Learners can independently diagnose and correct errors in the translation process by over 70% using metacognition.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
